data.content: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins by slowing their heart rate.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
Elephants are the only animals that cannot jump.
Cows form close bonds and have best friends.
Male seahorses are the ones that carry and give birth to babies.
Frogs can freeze without dying and thaw out later.
A snail can sleep for up to three years.
A shrimp's heart is located in its head.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
